name: streamline tank
sizes_available: xs (s, m, l, xl, 2x, 3x, 4x), see notes
notes:
inspired by the architectural lines of the 1920’s, the streamline tank is an easy to wear summer top that pairs effortlessly with everything from high-waisted sailor pants to cutoffs. this warm weather staple works up super quick and is written for eight sizes!

shop the full kit [here.][2] 

**sizes**
xs (s, m, l, xl, 2xl, 3xl, 4xl)
pictured in size s modeled with 4”/10cm of positive ease

**finished dimensions**
width: 17 (19, 20.75, 23, 24.75, 27, 28.75, 31)” / 43 (48.5, 52.5, 58.5, 63, 68.5, 73, 78.5) cm
full bust (after seaming): 33 (37, 40.5, 45, 48.5, 53, 56.5, 61)” / 84 (94, 103, 114.5, 123, 134.5, 143.5, 155) cm
length: 19.25 (19.75, 19.75, 20.25, 20.75, 21.25, 21.5, 22)” / 49 (50, 50, 51.5, 52.5, 54, 54.5, 56) cm

**difficulty level**
easy

**skills** 
the knit and purl stitches
k1b (knit 1 below)
ssk and k2tog decreases
ssp and p2tog decreases
m1l (make 1 left) and m1r (make 1 right) increases
csd (centered single decrease)

all patterns are written in standard us terms.
